item.title: SAML Authentication for Chrome in OSX
item.author: Author
item.description: The SAML authentication for Chrome in OS X is not supported as well as it’s running in Windows.

item.title: PowerShell Linux Server File Injection via Hypervisor
item.author: Author
item.description: Previous Post indicates that we are able to do one way copy files from HOST level to VM itself in Windows.

item.title: Batch - Windows Network Gateway Configuration
item.author: Author
item.description:
When you got 2 NIC on the same VM, one is Internal NIC, another is External NIC:

  • Internal: 172.23.0.0/24
  • External: 172.20.0.0/16
